issue.title: [C++] Create directories in CopyFiles when copying within the same filesystem
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10003](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10003). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CopyFiles creates parent directories for destination files, but only when copying between different filesystems. This behavior should be made consistent
